attributes.action: Make it an offence for employees to discrimiate against people who dont drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A friend of mine who doesn't have a driving license has been discriminated against several times when applying for because he doesn't drive when he is quite happy to use other forms of transport where driving is not part of the job.

Make it an offense to discriminate against people who don't have a Driving License unless the job requires you to drive i.e. bus driver, In this day and age of protecting the environment this should not be a problem.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
